name: Ludum Dare 48: Help! I'm trapped in an arcade factory
name_original: Ludum Dare 48: Help! I'm trapped in an arcade factory
description:
Ludum Dare 48

Deeper and Deeper

Oh no! You've become trapped in an arcade factory. Head DEEPER AND DEEPER through the arcade games to escape. Think of it like Inception, but instead of dreams it's games. And instead of a complicated plot there's no plot at all!

You can press R at any time to reset a level.

There is a bit of an issue with interaction in the 3D areas. You press space bar to interact with objects but it sometimes requires a little repositioning.

Enjoy!
